ibis.cashmere.constellation

Class Buffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.cashmere.constellation.Buffer

  • public class Buffer
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper of a ByteBuffer. The benefit of this Buffer against ByteBuffers is that it can be used in HashMaps. The rest of the Cashmere library assumes the use of Buffer instead of ByteBuffer. Many of the methods are directly applied on the underlying ByteBuffer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Buffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
      Creates a new Buffer from a ByteBuffer.
      Buffer(int size)
      Creates a new Buffer with a direct ByteBuffer.

        Returns:

      • position

        public Buffer position(int newPosition)
        Sets this buffer's position. If the mark is defined and larger than the new position then it is discarded.
        Parameters:
        newPosition - The new position value; must be non-negative and no larger than the current limit an int value
        Returns:
        this buffer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the preconditions on newPosition do not hold

      • getFloat

        public float getFloat(int position)
        Convenience method to get a float on position position.
        Parameters:
        position - the position in terms of the number of floats in the Buffer
        Returns:
        the floating point value on position position
